english.faq_intro: Welcome to the FAQ section! Here, you can find answers to common questions about using the bot.
english.faq_category_intro: Here are the frequently asked questions in this category.
english.choose_faq_question: Select a question to view its answer.
english.faq_profile_completion: How is my profile completion percentage calculated?
english.faq_profile_completion_answer: Your profile completion percentage is calculated based on how many required fields you have filled out, such as company name, city, contact number, employer type, about company, and verification documents.
english.faq_profile_strength: What does the profile strength bar mean?
english.faq_profile_strength_answer: The profile strength bar visually represents how complete your profile is. For example: ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë 50%.
english.faq_edit_profile: How do I edit my company profile?
english.faq_edit_profile_answer: From the main menu, go to the 'Edit Profile' section. You can update fields like company name, location, contact number, and more.
english.faq_delete_account: How do I delete my account?
english.faq_delete_account_answer: Go to the profile menu, select 'Delete My Account,' and confirm your choice. Note that this action cannot be undone.
english.faq_active_vacancies: How do I check my active vacancies and new applications?
english.faq_active_vacancies_answer: When you open the main menu, you'll see the number of active vacancies and new applications displayed. For example: 'Active Vacancies: 3 ‚ú®' and 'New Applications: 5 üî•'.
english.faq_post_job: How do I post a new job vacancy?
english.faq_post_job_answer: You can post a job by selecting the 'Post Vacancy' option. You'll be guided step-by-step to provide details like job title, employment type, gender preference, quantity, level, description, qualifications, skills, salary, benefits, and application deadline.
english.faq_manage_vacancies: Can I manage my active vacancies?
english.faq_manage_vacancies_answer: Yes, under 'Manage Vacancies,' you can view all your active, pending, expired, and closed job listings. You can also check the number of applications received for each vacancy and perform actions like viewing applicants, closing a job, renewing an expired vacancy, or checking stats.
english.faq_view_applicants: How do I view applicants for my vacancies?
english.faq_view_applicants_answer: Yes, under 'Manage Vacancies,' select an active or approved job and click 'View Applicants' to see the list of candidates who applied.
english.faq_view_analytics: What kind of analytics can I view?
english.faq_view_analytics_answer: You can view metrics like active vacancies, total applications, hire rate, and average response time.
english.faq_export_data: Can I export my job postings or application data?
english.faq_export_data_answer: Yes, you can export your data in CSV format. Use the 'Export Data' option under the Analytics or Database Management section to download reports.
english.faq_change_language: Can I change the language of the bot?
english.faq_change_language_answer: Yes, you can change the language by selecting the 'Change Language' option. Supported languages include English, Amharic, Oromo, Tigrinya, Afar, and Somali.
english.faq_employer_tips: What are the employer tips of the day?
english.faq_employer_tips_answer: These are helpful suggestions to improve your recruitment process. Examples include writing effective job descriptions, enhancing your employer brand, and using AI in recruiting.
english.faq_renew_vacancy: How do I renew an expired job vacancy?
english.faq_renew_vacancy_answer: Yes, you can renew expired vacancies. Select the 'Renew' option for the expired job and choose a renewal duration (e.g., 30 days, 60 days, or custom). The new deadline will be updated accordingly.
english.faq_close_job: Can I close a job vacancy before the deadline?
english.faq_close_job_answer: Yes, you can close an active job vacancy at any time by selecting the 'Close Job' option under the job details menu. You‚Äôll need to confirm the action before proceeding.
english.faq_download_cv: Is it possible to download a candidate‚Äôs CV?
english.faq_download_cv_answer: Yes, if the candidate has uploaded a CV, you can download it directly from their application details page by clicking the 'Download CV' button.
english.faq_accept_reject_applicant: What happens after I accept or reject an applicant?
english.faq_accept_reject_applicant_answer: Accept: The candidate is notified of their selection, and you can send them an optional message. Reject: You‚Äôll be prompted to provide a rejection reason, which will be shared with the candidate.
english.faq_quick_action_suggestions_answer: These are personalized prompts to help you take immediate actions, such as reviewing new applications or posting a vacancy.
english.faq_main_menu_options: What options are available in the Employer Main Menu?
english.faq_main_menu_options_answer: From the Employer Main Menu, you can: View and manage your profile (e.g., edit details, check profile completion), post new job vacancies or manage existing ones, view analytics about your recruitment performance, and access help and tips for improving your hiring process.

english.js_faq_registration_steps: How do I register as a job seeker?
english.js_faq_registration_steps_answer:
To register:
1. Select 'Job Seeker' during registration
2. Provide DOB, gender, contact info, and languages
3. Optionally add qualifications, skills, experience, and documents
english.js_faq_profile_update: Can I edit my profile after registration?
english.js_faq_profile_update_answer: Yes - update contact info, skills, qualifications, and documents anytime via 'Edit Profile'
english.js_faq_document_upload: How do I upload my CV/portfolio?
english.js_faq_document_upload_answer: Upload during registration/profile updates, or provide a portfolio link
english.js_faq_optional_fields: Can I skip optional registration fields?
english.js_faq_optional_fields_answer: Yes, but completing all fields improves profile credibility and visibility
english.js_faq_job_application_process: How do I apply for jobs?
english.js_faq_job_application_process_answer:
1. Click job post
2. Write tailored cover letter
3. Submit through the bot
english.js_faq_application_status: How do I check application status?
english.js_faq_application_status_answer: View all applications with status (Pending/Approved/Rejected) in 'My Applications'
english.js_faq_application_outcome_answer: You'll receive confirmation. If selected, employer will provide next steps. If rejected, you'll get feedback
english.js_faq_application_export_answer: Yes - export as Excel file (.xlsx) from 'My Applications'
english.js_faq_job_search: How do I search for jobs?
english.js_faq_job_search_answer: Use keyword search for titles, skills, or industries. Save searches for notifications
english.js_faq_advanced_filters_answer:
Filter by:
- Job type (Full-time/Part-time/Remote)
- Salary range
- Experience level
english.js_faq_search_sorting_answer: Sort by: Newest postings or Highest paying jobs
english.js_faq_search_saving_answer: Yes - saved searches will notify you of new matching jobs
english.js_faq_account_deletion: How do I delete my account?
english.js_faq_account_deletion_answer: Use 'Delete My Account' in settings (permanent and irreversible)
english.js_faq_data_visibility_answer: Control employer visibility through privacy settings in account management
english.js_faq_ban_notification: What happens if I get banned?
english.js_faq_ban_notification_answer: You'll receive a ban message with reason and appeal option
english.js_faq_appeal_process: How do I appeal a ban?
english.js_faq_appeal_process_answer: Use the 'üìù Appeal Ban' button in the ban message to submit your case (max 500 characters)
english.js_faq_appeal_review: What happens after submitting an appeal?
english.js_faq_appeal_review_answer: Admins will review your appeal and notify you of their decision
english.js_faq_ban_removal_answer: Yes, if your appeal is successful the ban will be removed
english.js_faq_appeal_rejection: What if my appeal is rejected?
english.js_faq_appeal_rejection_answer: The ban remains in place with explanation - serious/repeated violations typically stay banned
english.js_faq_admin_ban_criteria: How do admins decide to ban users?
english.js_faq_admin_ban_criteria_answer: Bans occur for violations like spamming, inappropriate behavior, or platform misuse with clear reasons provided
english.js_faq_ban_reason_visibility: Will I know my ban reason?
english.js_faq_ban_reason_visibility_answer: Yes, ban notifications always include the specific violation reason
english.js_faq_admin_ban_tools_answer:
Admins can:
- Search and ban by ID/name/company
- View ban list with reasons
- Review appeals and modify bans
english.admin_faq_intro: Manage platform operations, users, and content moderation
english.admin_tip_database_backup: Regularly export data backups for security
english.admin_tip_post_moderation: Always verify job post validity before approval
english.admin_tip_broadcast_usage: Use broadcasts for important platform announcements
english.admin_tip_ban_management: Document ban reasons clearly for accountability
english.admin_faq_panel_overview_ans: Central hub for platform management including user/job moderation and system operations
english.admin_faq_menu_options_ans: Manage jobs, share posts, broadcast messages, handle database operations, and view reports
english.admin_faq_job_management_ans: Approve/reject posts, view details, handle invalid entries
english.admin_faq_post_sharing_ans: Manually forward approved posts to channels/groups
english.admin_faq_invalid_posts_ans: System skips invalid posts and notifies admins for review
english.admin_faq_database_options_ans: Manage users/jobs/vacancies/applications, export data, and perform backups
english.admin_faq_data_deletion_ans: Yes - use 'Clear Data' with caution (permanent deletion)
english.admin_faq_broadcast_feature_ans: Send messages to all users or specific groups for announcements
english.admin_faq_ban_process_ans: Review appeals, view ban history, and modify ban status
english.admin_faq_appeal_review_ans: Check appeal validity and update ban status accordingly
english.admin_faq_ban_tools_ans: Search users, view ban list, and modify ban status
english.contact_admin_intro: Need help? Our support team is here to assist you. Please select the category that best describes your issue.
english.select_contact_category: Please select the category that best fits your question:
english.priority_explanation: Normal = within 24h, High = within 12h, Urgent = within 6h (for critical issues only)
english.write_your_message: Please write your message to support
english.avoid_spam: Avoid sending multiple messages about the same issue
english.response_time_notice: Our team will respond as soon as possible according to your selected priority.
english.contact_follow_up_info: You'll receive a notification when we respond. You can reply to that message to continue the conversation.
english.admin_reply_cancelled: Reply cancelled. No message was sent.
